Package stores

Class StaffDataStore

java.lang.Object
stores.StaffDataStore
public class StaffDataStore extends Object
The StaffDataStore class is responsible for managing staff data, including loading from and writing to a CSV file.

    • loadStaffFromCSV

      public void loadStaffFromCSV(String csvFilePath) throws IOException
      Loads staff data from a CSV file and populates the staff list.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - The path to the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • writeStaffToCSV

      public void writeStaffToCSV(String csvFilePath) throws IOException
      Writes the current staff list to a specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - The path to the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while writing the file.

    • removeStaff

      public void removeStaff(String staffId)
      Removes a staff member from the list by their ID.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the staff member to be removed.

    • getStaffList

      public Map<String,Staff> getStaffList()
      Retrieves the list of all staff members.
